name: AbsTRace-Demo
description:
AbsTRace sets you in a racing simulation.

While the racing simulation itself might seem rather bare bones, other aspects extend beyond the apparent function of the program that seems to be hosting a cast of distraught characters.  
The people inside don't seem to know how or why they ended up in there and beyond racing to the first place at the finish line, it is unclear what the goals of it all are.
